name: Zoo Management Game
description:
by Caleb Noller

A small experimental game about a fancy newfangled way to manage a zoo: teleportation!

 

Shoot a red bullet, then shoot a blue bullet. Anything the blue bullet hits will be instantly teleported to the red bullets location.

 

Controls

  • Arrow keys: move
  • Q: fire blue bullet
  • E: fire red bullet

 

Don't let the lion get too hungry!

See if you can make a comfy enclosure for when he sleeps.

There is a door with a corresponding button - try to add an openable door to the enclosure.
